rooms.description: Entry area with Scandinavian minimalistic design elements.
Open living space combining living and dining areas, featuring large windows for natural light in line with Vastu principles ensuring east-west exposure.
Functional kitchen area integrated into the living space, designed for efficiency and minimalistic aesthetics.
Multipurpose studio bedroom that can be converted based on usage; designed with Scandinavian furniture and ample storage to maximize space.

additional_features.description: Scandinavian-inspired rooftop terrace with greenery, seating area, and panoramic views; designed to respect local climate conditions and provide a relaxing outdoor space.
